If you rest outdoors for 10 minutes during the day, you regain Hit Points equal to your [[/r (@actor.level/2)*(max(@actor.abilities.con.mod,1))]]{Constitution modifier Ã— half your level} . You gain this benefit in addition to any healing from @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Treat Wounds].

Leshies whose plant nourishment does not rely on photosynthesis require a similarly suitable environment. For example, fungus leshies need dark, damp environments and a pile of decaying plant matter.
